#summary Format of training and test data and the lexicon
#labels format

= Train and test data =

Use one token per line, sentences separated  by blank lines. 
Token format is whitespace separated list:
{{{
FORM LEMMA MORPHO-TAG
}}}

For example

{{{
Mais    mais    C_C
les     le      D_def-mp
Espagnols       Espagnols       N_P-mp
ne      ne      ADV_neg
sont    Ãªtre    V-indicatifpresent3p
pas     pas     ADV_neg
en      en      P
reste   reste   N_C-ms
.       .       PONCT_S
 
L'      le      D_def-fs
agence  agence  N_C-fs
TBWA    TBWA    N_P-ms
}}}


= Lexicon format =

One entry per line, fields in each entry separated by whitespace.
{{{
FORM LEMMA1 MORPHO-TAG1 LEMMA2 MORPHO-TAG2  ...
}}}
